title: What is the first class percentage for 10th and 12th standard in Tamil Nadu? - Quora

response.answer_text: In Tamil Nadu classes or grades are not awarded for 10th(SSLC) and 12th(HSc) standard Exams. Generally 60% and above is considered as 1st class and above 75%,distinction class in the university level.There was no 12th std in schools in sixties, but the12th year of study then was designated as pre university course, taught in arts and science colleges,where grade system was followed with above percentage.
Deliberate question to harass others. Moderators: TN never never never awarded ANY CLASS to 10th / 12th class. Even if some one scores 600/600- no class is awarded.
